featured.text: He enclosed thank- you notes in the cookies and served them to his guests with tea.
He returned the tickets, enclosing a note, which said, “I shall be busy that evening.

definition.zh_def: 圍住或包圍某物，使其不易被外界接觸。
definition.en_def: To surround or close off on all sides.
definition.example: The garden was enclosed by a tall fence.
